website_summaries.verdict: Though you should bring it inside in wet weather, this faux leather pouf is durable enough for outdoor use.
pros: Attractive design with several color options
Could also be used as a seat or side table

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I went with this one! I was looking at real leather ones, but they were just too expensive and everyone commented on how bad they smell so I’m glad I got this one that looks just like leather and it is a beautiful unique green color and no smell! It goes perfect in the nursery. I filled it with old clothes and sheets. And I used ALOT LOL. I couldn’t believe how much fit in there but it’s not gonna Move around on me! I can’t seem to get it as even as I would like everywhere but I still love it. Thank you so much for my beautiful pouf!
customer_reviews.author: Sami's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much, I read the reviews and saw someone suggested using spare blankets. We just moved and I didn't have enough to stuff them with so I used a 18" seat cushion on the top and then went to good will and stocked up on queen blankets at half off (Score!). Stuffed them and they are HEAVY! and the seat cushion helped shape the top. I went back and bought the blue one. In the Summer they will be used outdoors a on a covered patio and ill put them inside in the living room come winter. Stuffed you can get them up to about 18"" Sturdy heavy metal zipper and it seems to be well sewed.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy A

customer_reviews.title: Great look and value.
customer_reviews.text: It's so beautiful! No odd smell. Stuffed with pillows, old jeans and towels. Very heavy. Goes so well with this teal leather chair, which also came from Amazon! Shipping was very fast! 3 days!
customer_reviews.author: WEA Charities

customer_reviews.title: Loving this!
customer_reviews.text: We got the blue and i love the colors. It looks expensive. Stuffed with extra blankets and pillows for now.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Walters

customer_reviews.title: Larger than you think when stuffing - GREAT VALUE - GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product - very well made - keep in mind that when you are stuffing it, it is much larger than you think - you could easily fit 2 folded bed size pillows inside and still need to add some additional stuffing depending on how full/firm you would like it to be. Colors are great, construction is sturdy - Excellent product and great value - worth the wait as it did take a little longer that normal to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: robert autenrieth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and beautiful ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Riseon Moroccan ottoman. The colors are slightly different than in the picture. Mine does not have the lighter shades of brown. I was a bit disappointed by that but it is beautiful and I'm happy with it. I stuffed it with a combo of towels and foam from another ottoman I no longer use. The ottoman is high quality and well made. The size and height is perfect, just what I was looking for. It arrived folded flat but did not have any crease marks when opened up. I was going to rate it 4 stars for the color variance, but it is so beautiful it gets 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love how these look
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, and I love the look of them in my living room. One came with a busted zipper. Unfortunately I had bought these in advance for redecorating and was past the return window by the time I opened them to use. I pulled out my industrial sewing machine and fixed it, but I wish I had checked and saved myself the trouble. I stuffed each one with used mailing supplies- an empty box for support and balled up mailers around it for cushion. So far they have held up well to my kids playing on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coolest thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today and I couldnt be happier. It's very well constructed (you can see inside to see the stitching) and worked beautifully in my nautical suite guest bedroom with navy chair. The stampings in the leather are perfect. It was easy to stuff and can be used anywhere. I also plan to use it as a meditation pillow, as the usual meditation pillows are too low to the floor (I'm old and it's hard to get back up). It's totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mcleod

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute ottoman, though a little pricier than I would have liked. I stuffed ours with a gazillion plastic grocery bags that I didn't want to send to the landfill. I'm still adding more as I get them from the grocery! It's surprising how many it holds. I was afraid it would make that crinkly sound when used, but it doesn't at all. Such a cute addition to the room, and a little extra seating if needed.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Great look and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Yes you will need one large bag of miniature balls to fill it. When the little foam balls arrived I thought that large bag will never fit in that footstool; well yes they did. I put our little balls in a plastic garbage bag so that they would not fall out if one of the little grandchildren would unzip the bottom zipper. I put this ottoman in a room that had a black Arhaus Furniture bookcase with a brown leather chair and a khaki couch. It has the perfect colors in it to blend everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Kahanson

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love this footstool. I stuffed it with leftover fabric and batting scraps. It does hold quite a large quantity. The zipper is metal and it was easy to put the stuffing in. Once it has settled I was able to add more. I have a brown sofa so the different shades of brown go just great with both my sofa and my rug. Very classy looking and just the right height to rest my feet. Very pleased. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy  Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coloring, very bohemian. 💚
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as big as I thought it would be, but I still love it. And it’s my fault for not reading the description better that it wouldn’t come stuffed. I was a little shocked when I first opened it and seeing it folded up in a plastic bag, read the amazon description again and then realized I’d be stuffing it myself 😁. It now has a bunch of summer clothes in it, eventually I’ll get a different filler for it. Overall I really like the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Leeann Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It's beautiful and sturdy and good sized! I stuffed it with blankets. It's packed with so many blankets and it looks perfect. No stuffing needed. I'm obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color match for almost any leather couch or chair!
customer_reviews.text: Alright... this is legit a fantastic ottoman. I am big on matching and have been searching for a long time. This is it. LOVE IT! Ps I am going to put another blanket or two in it. It currently has inside of it 1 queen comforter, 1 queen blanket, and 2 thick winter throw blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I did not expect it to be as large as it is. It is made of nice material and has a nice zipper. Looks very high quality. I stuffed it with a pillow, t-shirts, and will have to find something else to add to it. Overall, it is a great product and I wi be buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Clark

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Comes Unstuffed
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and the description and I swear it never stated it came unstuffed. That being said, once I stuffed it, it is a really nice pouf. I ended up using old pillows and blankets I was going to get rid of anyway as opposed to spending the money on stuffing.
customer_reviews.author: Maura Hill

customer_reviews.title: A smart tidy-hack for the home
customer_reviews.text: Unstuffed poufs are my new favorite tidy-up hack! I was going to spend $200 on a small pouf which looks identical to this one. I love that this pouf has more function than a standard pouf. I have mine stuffed with winter jackets and extra blankets. It looks lovely and no one knows that it’s actually storage.
customer_reviews.author: amazonconsumer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Decorative Foot Rest
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to our family room furniture. Love the colors and feel. Stuffed it with four old pillows that we were going to get rid of. Great way to use recycleables for stuffing.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine K

customer_reviews.title: Cute but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This review is low due to the zipper breaking during first use. Filling it, went to close and the handle of the zipper came completely off. The zipper portion has since come open. Looks cute but disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: zzmv5

customer_reviews.title: Too much work to make it work
customer_reviews.text: It is very beautiful but very hard to fill and to look symmetrical. Also, I wanted to order another one but takes ever to arrive. By the time you fill with stuffs it came out to be over $70.00. I should have just bought real Ottoman from the furniture store.
customer_reviews.author: arthak adhikari

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: So this is just a case! So a lot of the confines depends on what you stuff it with. I used shredded foam from a previous bean bag chair and filled the bottom with polyester to keep air from escaping so fast and it is super comfy and firm! The case is super thick and such a nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Feels very very real,  very happy
customer_reviews.text: Does not feel fake at all. Really feels like real leather. Beyond excellent quality. So glad I bought this. Very happy with this purchase. So worth it. Shipping was unbelievably fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Carrasquillo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Colors were as shown; It's attractive and looks durable. The zipper on the bottom was also sturdy. The reviews were very helpful in figuring out how best to "stuff" the ottoman. Only issue in comfort/appearance is stuffing it so it is evenly filled.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Super Duper Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this faux leather ottoman. The style is very detailed and the colors are rich and vibrant - just like in the advertisement. Cute addition to my home. Better than the genuine leather version I purchased previously from different on-line store, it smelled so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lay Lay

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I purchased it so I have a comfy seat to pull up to the fire. Even better, I used three bags of clean rags, old sheets and towels as fill. I was originally going to buy foam, but I feel so much better having recycled my old items! I originally just place them in there folded up. Then I realized it felt better when I opened everything up so they were laying flat on top of each other. It’s very comfy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ohiogal

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It does not come with an insert, I filled mine with old pillows which works great! It looks fabulous in my home office, and it's super functional for my shorter legs.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Leah

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: The quality looks really good. It was difficult at first figuring out how much stuffing to add, but waited until they looked softened and then added more.
customer_reviews.author: Plant lover

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this pouf! I stuffed an entire queen comforter set (comforter, fitted sheet, regular sheet, & pillow shams) AND two other fitted sheets in here. I haven’t let it settle yet but it’s still not extremely full so I may add more later. It saved me a lot of space in my hall closet and goes so well with my faux leather pillow shams and decor. This is probably my favorite amazon purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabi Monk

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and size of the pouf. I filled them with pillows I bought @ Goodwill. I returned one of them as the zipper broke. I don't plan on using them for seating...only decor.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Bellows

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is a poor design
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman but after stuffing and re stuffing a few times, the zipper just snapped right off. I’m so disappointed. I will be contacting the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Really love the product high-quality looks really beautiful in my reading room which looks over the English Navy Cove
customer_reviews.author: judy jetson

customer_reviews.title: Wow...just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, beautiful colors and just perfect size..and no smell whatsoever. buying another one now!
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Very useful in more ways than one.
customer_reviews.text: I love the ottoman. It really goes with my leather furniture. I stuffed it with plastic grocery bags. What a wonderful way to use the bags. Stuffed with the plastic bags makes it very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: jennie T

customer_reviews.title: I want another one!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! It looks like leather but it will be fine in the weather! It’s comfy too! I’m getting another one. You do have to stuff it yourself though.
customer_reviews.author: L. hester

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. It didn’t match the way I thought it would, but otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Shannonb

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart!!!
customer_reviews.text: It fell apart the first day! The sipper broke when I tried zipping it up after putting only one quilt in it. It definitely wasn’t overstuffed. The seams on top came apart soon after. Cheaply made especially for the money!! I’m sooo disappointed and frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foot stoll
customer_reviews.text: I recommend it but read carefully You have to stuff urself
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Billings

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love my little ottoman! Matched perfectly with my leather chair because of the different shades of leather.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Such amazing quality for the price - this looks super-expensive. The colors are beautiful. It is very large and takes a lot of stuffing.
customer_reviews.author: maryjo

customer_reviews.title: I feel so soft I thought I bought a real leather
customer_reviews.text: much better than the one I bought from the Middle East
customer_reviews.author: Manal GilmanGreenan

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I dunno if I like the quality, but It's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: awkward penguin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it.
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! It’s durable and well made. Pretty sure they sent me a real leather one by mistake. Love the color variation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This does come flat/empty- but it’s gorgeous and very affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous ottoman pouf! This thing holds a ton- we opted to fill with old pillows blankets etc rather than purchasing polyfill.. so it’s a great storage solution! The zipper on the underside seems to be made very sturdy and the overall look is perfect- beautiful details!
customer_reviews.author: Kory D.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Took a little bit to figure out the right combination of fill for right feel. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GGFarm

customer_reviews.title: UNSTUFFED!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing bad I can say about this product. It came exactly as described. The material is great and the colors are beautiful. It’s perfectly made, very unique and elegant which gives a great touch to any space. I am so happy I purchased this faux leather pouf. REMEMBER TO BUY THE STUFFING because it comes unstuffed!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Torres

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for my grandkids to use around our coffee table or as a floor pillow. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gonsalves

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Looks great and it never smelled like anything at all. I used and old king size down comforter to fill it and i think it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Cute ottoman
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute. I stuffed it with pillows and blankets and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Barnhill

customer_reviews.title: Nice foot stool
customer_reviews.text: I realy like it and can't believe how much you can stuff in it. I've been slowly adding more item as it settles. Only thing I don't like is the piping and would prefer it was a dark color.
customer_reviews.author: Heysay!

customer_reviews.title: Colors were just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these ottomans for our TV room. They were bigger than I thought they would be. For now, we stuffed them with a combination of extra pillows we had and some old blankets. They are very well made and sturdy, with a heavy duty zipper. We really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne E. Talich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This pouf fits right in with my boho themed room! I’m using it as a foot rest for my swinging hammock chair and I love it. I used several old/unused blankets so stuff it and I love how it looks. Great quality! And my cat approves also ;)
customer_reviews.author: Miranda P.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love it but after a few days, a little area of the seam started to unravel. I mended it but hope it lasts. I should have taken a picture but didn't think of it at the time
customer_reviews.author: panh2o

customer_reviews.title: Neat 4 feet
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Sturdy leather and attractive. I got stuffing at Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Bryan J. Aho

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors options to match your furniture and handmade!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived unstuffed. I had two bags of clothes for donations which I end up using to fill this poof. Love it, especially after I’ve shopped for months for an ottoman to match my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, ripped out in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Ripped out in 3 months with not even much use. I bought two to pair as decor for the living room. Now I need to toss the other in a corner too. Waste of money 😔
customer_reviews.author: Deerpark

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great pouf! No chemical or stain smells like the goat leather ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great and we chose to fill it with our plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Licia

customer_reviews.title: great feeling material
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of the material and it's a great size. I wish it was just a little taller but it's super cute. great find!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this little ottoman. It comes cutely packaged, and the quality is great. Looks and feels like leather but love that it's not. My favorite part is it comes unstuffed, so I stuffed it with blankets and now it doubles as storage. By far the best value ottoman on the site.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought I was getting
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize this was just a cover and then had to stuff it with six pillows. Is pricey for just a docer
customer_reviews.author: baba

customer_reviews.title: Quality ottoman (unstuffed)
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality, thick faux leather. Seems sturdy. It doesn't show in the picture well, but there's a nice embossed pattern on each section on the top. I stuffed mine with shredded furniture foam and it's very comfy as an ottoman.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I’d hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: I love that it fits all my extra blankets. Looks even better in person. Appears to be of good sturdy quality. I love it
customer_reviews.author: brianna f

customer_reviews.title: Feels really nice
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. She uses it all the time when reading
customer_reviews.author: Murrdawg

customer_reviews.title: Arrived torn
customer_reviews.text: It arrived torn on bottom by the zipper and now the bottom has completely come open, zipper unable to zip back up.
customer_reviews.author: barderobo

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not filled with anything
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t filled with anything. I guess I missed that in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice poof
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful poof! Took me awhile to get filling that wasn’t crazy expensive, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Strawther

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable Ottomans!
customer_reviews.text: We love our ottomans. We use them outside on our covered patio in front of our adirondack chairs. Very cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pat Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good ottoman cushion seat!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size ottoman. Heavy when full. Sturdy. Comfortable to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to repurpose old items
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly as described. It's unstuffed so you can cram all sorts of items in it which is a wonderful way to repurpose old pillows, stuffed animals etc. I stuffed five bedroom pillows and two articles of old clothing to fill it all the way. It's very sturdy when stuffed and distributing the weight of the items is pretty easy. Also the zipper is strong. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pouf!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and looks expensive. I stuffed mine with shredded foam from Joanns. I get lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good for some extra storage, comfy and
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. Thought it smelled fine. I liked that I could use it for storage. Met my expectations for sure. Comfy to sit on, the kiddo and the pets like to sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremyh

product_meta.title: RISEON Boho Handmade Faux PU Leather Moroccan Pouf Footstool Ottoman Leather Poufs Unstuffed 23" x 11" -Round Floor Cushion Footstool for Living Room, Bedroom and Under Desk (Brown)
product_meta.description:
Color:BrownRISEON Boho Handmade Leather Moroccan Pouf Footstool Ottoman Leather Poufs Unstuffed 
Pouffes, also known as ottomans, make a stunning home furnishing accessory and give great character to any room in your house. 
Leather pouffes have many practical uses from seats to footstools to decorative side tables. 
Choose from an array of different colours.

Material: crazy horse PU Leather

Measurements:23" diameter X 11" high when filled.

Notice:The poufs are shipped UNSTUFFED. 
(1)You can buy polystyrene balls or cotton filling locally, or 
(2)Stuff the pouf with old cushions, recycling old clothing and fabrics to using old plastic supermarket bags. We recommend you to fill the pouf with this eco-friendly way as mentioned above, and fill them in our Moroccan Pouffes.
feature_bullets: The poufs are shipped UNSTUFFED. You can use polyester or cotton fiber filling.
Material:Faux PU Leather.May have a smell,just need to air it out for a while.
This versatile oversized ottoman pouf will make a statement in any home with its distinctive pattern and soft appearance
Measurement: 23" diameter X 11" high when filled. Bottom zipper for convenient stuffing. Cleaning: use mild leather cleaner when needed.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars194 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
